summary: The diff implements the core requirements of a Minecraft-style village game with a blue bird character using React Three Fiber. All five requirements are substantially addressed: the 3D village scene (REQ-1), the blue bird character with controls (REQ-2), a follow camera (REQ-3), HUD with mute/unmute and position display (REQ-4), and Minecraft pixel-art UI theme (REQ-5). However, the camera does not rotate with the bird's movement direction as specified in REQ-3, and the terrain only uses a single grass-dirt texture rather than distinctly showing grass, dirt, AND stone blocks as separate voxel types.

missing_requirements.requirement: Blocky terrain must include grass, dirt, AND stone blocks as distinct voxel types
missing_requirements.reason: The Terrain component renders a uniform 32x32 grid using a single grass-dirt texture with no separate stone block layers or distinct dirt sub-layers. No stone blocks appear in the terrain itself.

missing_requirements.requirement: Camera should rotate with the bird's movement direction
missing_requirements.reason: FollowCamera uses a fixed world-space OFFSET (0, 6, 11) added to the bird's position regardless of facing direction. The camera does not rotate to stay behind the bird relative to its facing angle.

hallucinated_features.description: Stone path (PathBlocks) winding through the village in a cross pattern
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any village paths or road infrastructure.

hallucinated_features.description: Crosshair overlay in the center of the screen
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention a crosshair or reticle as part of the HUD.

hallucinated_features.description: Title bar HUD element displaying 'BLUE BIRD VILLAGE' at the top center
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies position coordinates and control hints for the HUD but does not request a title bar overlay.

hallucinated_features.description: Wing flap animation and body bob on the blue bird character
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies a blocky voxel bird model with movement controls but does not specify wing animations.
